description: “Almost a perfect crime.” The hacking ring and an attempt to steal a billion dollars. Investigators blame North Korea. Pyongyang denies involvement. The story begins in Hollywood.
title: The Lazarus Heist

itunes.summary:
A frightening global attack, hospitals in chaos and an accidental hero with a secret. A virus spreads from computer to computer in 150 countries, causing billions of dollars in damage. It’s the story of WannaCry and Marcus Hutchins.
Please help spread the word about #Lazarusheist

itunes.summary:
“Dark arts”, murders and a place with a murky past. Breaking news: an unexpected interview with one of the middlemen. 
Please help us spread the word about #LazarusHeist on social media and leave ratings and reviews.

Correction: This episode says that Kim Jong-nam was killed in 2015. The correct date was 2017.

itunes.summary:
A costly spelling error and “a fight in the bank” over $20 million. The hunt for a mysterious middleman takes us to Japan.
#LazarusHeist
itunes.author: BBC World Service
itunes.subtitle: A costly spelling error, a mysterious middleman and “a fight in the bank”

itunes.summary:
A car loaded with cash, fake millionaires and death threats – we’re following the money. After they hacked into the billion dollar account, it was time to gamble. The story moves to the Philippines. 
#LazarusHeist  
Please help us spread the word and leave ratings and reviews.

itunes.summary:

#LazarusHeist

itunes.summary:
Surveillance, state control, executions and how to become a hacker.
The FBI has accused Park Jin Hyok of being a hacker but how much choice do members of the Lazarus group actually have?
#LazarusHeist
itunes.author: BBC World Service
itunes.subtitle: Surveillance, state control, executions and how to become a hacker. #LazarusHeist

itunes.summary:
“I was terrified.” Panic in Hollywood, careers ruined and helium filled balloons sent to North Korea. President Obama makes clear who he blames for the Sony hack.
#LazarusHeist

itunes.summary:
A movie, Kim Jong-un and a devastating cyber attack. The story of the Sony hack. How the Lazarus Group hackers caused mayhem in Hollywood and for Sony Pictures Entertainment. 
And this is just the beginning…
#LazarusHeist
itunes.author: BBC World Service
itunes.subtitle: A movie, Kim Jong-un and a devastating cyber attack. The story of the Sony hack

itunes.summary: The most daring bank theft ever attempted? From hacking Hollywood to a billion-dollar plot. North Korea stands accused but says it had nothing to do with it and it’s part of the United States’ attempts to tarnish its image. Premieres 19 April 2021. A true crime investigation with Geoff White and Jean Lee.
itunes.author: BBC World Service
itunes.subtitle: The most daring bank raid ever attempted? From hacking Hollywood to a billion-dollar plot
